fieldsInReferences.description: The names of the fields that should be used in references.

fieldsInLists.description: The names of the fields that should be shown in lists, including meta fields.

isPublished.description: Set it to true to autopublish the schema.

noFieldDeletion.description: True, when fields should not be deleted.

noFieldRecreation.description: True, when fields with different types should not be recreated.

contentsSidebarUrl.description: The url to a the sidebar plugin for content lists.

contentSidebarUrl.description: The url to a the sidebar plugin for content items.

contentEditorUrl.description: The url to the editor plugin.

validateOnPublish.description: True to validate the content items on publish.

query.description: The script that is executed for each query when querying contents.

create.description: The script that is executed when creating a content.

update.description: The script that is executed when updating a content.

delete.description: The script that is executed when deleting a content.

change.description: The script that is executed when change a content status.

name.description: The name of the field. Must be unique within the schema.

isHidden.description: Defines if the field is hidden.

isLocked.description: Defines if the field is locked.

isDisabled.description: Defines if the field is disabled.

partitioning.description: Determines the optional partitioning of the field.

placeholder.description: Placeholder to show when no value has been entered.

isRequired.description: Indicates if the field is required.

isRequiredOnPublish.description: Indicates if the field is required when publishing.

isHalfWidth.description: Indicates if the field should be rendered with half width only.

defaultValues.description: The language specific default value as a list of asset ids.

folderId.description: The initial id to the folder.

maxItems.description: The maximum allowed items for the field value.

minSize.description: The minimum file size in bytes.

maxSize.description: The maximum file size in bytes.

minWidth.description: The minimum image width in pixels.

maxWidth.description: The maximum image width in pixels.

minHeight.description: The minimum image height in pixels.

maxHeight.description: The maximum image height in pixels.

aspectWidth.description: The image aspect width in pixels.

aspectHeight.description: The image aspect height in pixels.

mustBeImage.description: Defines if the asset must be an image.

resolveFirst.description: True to resolve first asset in the content list.

resolveImage.description: True to resolve first image in the content list.

allowDuplicates.description: True, if duplicate values are allowed.
